name: Working Woman Police Mom
description:
“A strong women stand for herself but a stronger woman stands up for everybody”

As you read above quote regarding working women so It becomes difficult for a working women to handle job and dream home as mother to keep her family happy at one time. For this we bring the virtual working police mom home game, where you can learn how to balance between job and virtual home. You are police cop mom who gets up early in the morning, cleaning the house, preparing breakfast for her kids, see off her husband for his office and leave the kids to the school and after these tasks she perform the duty as police officer in CY city to cut down the crime.
